thread.title: Man Prank Calls School as a Young Child Calling Out Sick
thread.title_full: Man Prank Calls School as a Young Child Calling Out Sick

author: Glen Tickle
title: Man Prank Calls School as a Young Child Calling Out Sick
text:
Man Hilariously Prank Calls School as a Young Child Who Is Calling In Sick   
Tim Bradbury prank called a school as his character “ Tiny Tim ” to tell them that the fictional “three nearly six year” old would not be coming into school that day . Tim managed to keep school employees on the phone for about six minutes while they asked the boy about his teacher and parents. 
Calling in sick at school I don’t go to. Cause panic in school in the local area. Kids voice. Wind up. Prank call.
